channel.title: PhobiaScape
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt]Welcome to PhobiaScape [Under Development] [/size][/center]
Hey guys, my name is Jared. I am incredibly new to moparscape as having an account goes, but I do visit it quite often. Anyways, this is going to be the server development for the server I am creating called PhobiaScape!
[center][size=20pt] About Phobia in General [/size][/center]
Okay, so Phobia is basically a gaming host type deal that me and my friend Adam have. Currently we have one dedicated custom server (yes server not a VPS) that is located in NYC in a datacenter. We currently host:
~CoD 4: Promod ~Minecraft: Survival with and without plugins
and soon to be this server!
So this is a big leap forward with Phobia seeing as we haven't added games in a while. This will be my first time coding RSPS, but don't worry, I have a inkling of knowledge, and I hate to be spoon-fed almost as much as the people on this forum hate to spoon-feed. :D
[center][size=20pt]Server Development | PhobiaScape [/size][/center]
Red = Not Started Blue = Under Development Green = Finished *Of course tweaks may still occur*
::help command teleports to a location with NPC that have dialogue to help new users out Complete Commands Rewrite: Reason Being was PlayerRights was being messed up in the pre-written file. Complete Use of Spellbooks: Lunar is not showing the images of spells for some reason. Others work fine. Staff Zone and Donor Zone Getting kick to work: Right now just disconnects then reconnects instantly Ban is created, IPBan is not (Currently just box banning from our dedicated server Ban is created, IPBan is not (Currently just box banning from our dedicated server Custom Quests (3) to get Quest Cape Changing the teleports Combat System Rewrite: Reason Being a Few Factors aren't working correctly Webclient to be hosted at www.gophobia.com Custom Boss Fights i.e. Banker just before meeting KBD Banker Dialogue Setting a PIN for your Bank Cleaning up Code Better Drop Rates for an ECO server Better EXP Rates *To be Decided On* Making teleports look at Spell book and use correct teleport animation
Basically I will be adding a ton more RED's to this list, and hopefully they will be turning green soon! Please give me support, because even if it doesn't sound like the best server ever, it is my first time ever trying. Also leave some tips / tricks if you would like to help me out!
[center][size=20pt] Update Reel [/size][/center]
This will be an area where I will put the newest things added, I will keep the recent 5 items on here:
1. Added New Commands. Still don't know if my method is okay, but no one answered my thread on switches :D
2.
3.
4.
5.
[center][size=20pt]Basic Server Info[/size][/center]
Source: PI Client: Generic PI Client (sorry for no links =/)
Green = I am working
Red = I am not working
I am currently not working on the server Due to immature DDoSers lol Dealing with the problem shortly.
Thanks to everyone who replies!
Yours truly,
phobia.bosco, Senior Admin of Phobia

Well alright but all of your goals so far you should already have done before making this development.

item.title: PhobiaScape
item.dc:creator: @Phobia.Bosco Phobia.Bosco
item.description:
@Phobia.Bosco wrote:

mr extremez:

Good luck. Those goals are way to easy though lol… And what base are you actually using?

  1. Said I would be adding QUOTE a ton more Red’s

  2. This is my first ever attempt, and it seems like I’m doing okay so far

  3. Thanks for the good luck

[quote=“k1ng0frs, post:5, topic:444571”]Thanks
good luck i like your goals[/quote]

item.description:
@Phobia.Bosco wrote:

[center][size=20pt]Welcome to PhobiaScape [Under Development] [/size][/center]

Hey guys, my name is Jared. I am incredibly new to moparscape as having an account goes, but I do visit it quite often. Anyways, this is going to be the server development for the server I am creating called PhobiaScape!

[center][size=20pt] About Phobia in General [/size][/center]

Okay, so Phobia is basically a gaming host type deal that me and my friend Adam have. Currently we have one dedicated custom server (yes server not a VPS) that is located in NYC in a datacenter. We currently host:

~CoD 4: Promod
~Minecraft: Survival with and without plugins

and soon to be this server!

So this is a big leap forward with Phobia seeing as we haven’t added games in a while. This will be my first time coding RSPS, but don’t worry, I have a inkling of knowledge, and I hate to be spoon-fed almost as much as the people on this forum hate to spoon-feed.

[center][size=20pt]Server Development | PhobiaScape [/size][/center]

Red = Not Started
Blue = Under Development
Green = Finished Of course tweaks may still occur

::help command teleports to a location with NPC that have dialogue to help new users out
Complete Commands Rewrite: Reason Being was PlayerRights was being messed up in the pre-written file.
Complete Use of Spellbooks: Lunar is not showing the images of spells for some reason. Others work fine.
Staff Zone and Donor Zone
Getting kick to work: Right now just disconnects then reconnects instantly
Ban is created, IPBan is not (Currently just box banning from our dedicated server
Ban is created, IPBan is not (Currently just box banning from our dedicated server
Custom Quests (3) to get Quest Cape
Changing the teleports
Combat System Rewrite: Reason Being a Few Factors aren’t working correctly
Webclient to be hosted at www.gophobia.com
Custom Boss Fights i.e. Banker just before meeting KBD
Banker Dialogue
Setting a PIN for your Bank
Cleaning up Code
Better Drop Rates for an ECO server
Better EXP Rates To be Decided On
Making teleports look at Spell book and use correct teleport animation

Basically I will be adding a ton more RED’s to this list, and hopefully they will be turning green soon! Please give me support, because even if it doesn’t sound like the best server ever, it is my first time ever trying. Also leave some tips / tricks if you would like to help me out!

[center][size=20pt] Update Reel [/size][/center]

This will be an area where I will put the newest things added, I will keep the recent 5 items on here:

Due to immature DDoSers lol Dealing with the problem shortly.

Thanks to everyone who replies!
